titleStmt.title: Quæries: or a dish of pickled-herring shread, cut and prepared according to the Dutch fashion. For the squeamish consciences of English phanaticks, who pray for the new-building of their old Babell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Amsterdam for the use of the high and mighty states of Holland, and re-printed at London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
